00243 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00244 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00245 
00246 inline CustomHitOrder::CustomHitOrder()
00247 {
00248     if (1 == m_hitSortingStrategy)
00249     {
00250         pSortFunction = &CustomHitOrder::SortByDensityWeight;
00251     }
00252     else
00253     {
00254         pSortFunction = &CustomHitOrder::SortByEnergy;
00255     }
00256 }
00257 
00258 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00259 
00260 inline bool CustomHitOrder::operator()(const pandora::CaloHit *lhs, const pandora::CaloHit *rhs) const
00261 {
00262     return (this->*pSortFunction)(lhs, rhs);
00263 }
00264 
00265 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00266 
00267 inline bool CustomHitOrder::SortByEnergy(const pandora::CaloHit *lhs, const pandora::CaloHit *rhs) const
00268 {
00269     return (!(lhs->GetInputEnergy() > rhs->GetInputEnergy()) && !(rhs->GetInputEnergy() > lhs->GetInputEnergy()) ?
00270         (lhs > rhs) :
00271         (lhs->GetInputEnergy() > rhs->GetInputEnergy()));
00272 }
00273 
00274 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00275 
00276 inline bool CustomHitOrder::SortByDensityWeight(const pandora::CaloHit *lhs, const pandora::CaloHit *rhs) const
00277 {
00278     return (!(lhs->GetDensityWeight() > rhs->GetDensityWeight()) && !(rhs->GetDensityWeight() > lhs->GetDensityWeight()) ?
00279         (lhs > rhs) :
00280         (lhs->GetDensityWeight() > rhs->GetDensityWeight()));
00281 }

00283 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00284 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00285 
00286 inline pandora::Algorithm *ConeClusteringAlgorithm::Factory::CreateAlgorithm() const
00287 {
00288     return new ConeClusteringAlgorithm();
00289 }
